We’re a world-high-class web hosting company who offer a range of hosting services, including web hosting, vps cloud hosting and reseller hosting. With more than 10 years in the hosting industry and over 10,000 clients from 160+ countries around the world, we’ve earned a reputation for excellence.

We’re focused on delivering excellent levels of service with fast and reliable web servers, along with helpful and friendly customer support from our own offices in the Europe.

This means that you can use and enjoy our hosting services whether you’re a home user, a small business or a large enterprise. So no matter how large or small your requirements may be, we’re sure to have a hosting solution for you.

WHAT MAKES OUR WEB HOSTING #1?

1. Super Fast Hosting
We use caching technology and SSD disks which makes our hosting super fast!

2. MagicSpam Protection
Your account has MagicSpam Pro enabled, protecting your domain 24/7.

3. Attracta SEO Tools
Increase your search rankings with our free integrated SEO tools.

4. Daily Backups
We provide R1 CDP Daily Backups of your account to external storage for free.

5. Zyro & Rv Website Builder
You can easily create your website in a few clicks without any coding knowledge.

6. CloudFlare Integration
Cache content and filter malicious traffic before it hits your server.

7. Free 24×7/365 Support
You can reach our team at any time, day or night.

8. 99.99% Uptime Guarantee
We use failover and self-healing technology.

9. 30 Day Money-back Guarantee
If you're not completely satisfied, simply cancel within 30 days.
